desc: Crystallized sparks shed from a Revenant's shell. Commonly used as a catalyst in crafting.

dictionary.lore:
Crystallized sparks shed from the outer shell of a Revenant. Gives off a powerful static shock when brought within close range of several other crystals. Often used as a catalyst in crafting.

These crystals are among the more dangerous of the Revenant materials, as their volatility and penchant for loosing sparks can set off a string of terrible accidents.

name: Orebi Sparkstone
